casebody.data:
ADLER STILMAN, PLLC, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
OAKWOOD HEALTHCARE, INC., and Citizens Insurance Company of America, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157446
COA: 333538 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 23, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before May 29, 2018.
